New Records: LeBron James broke Michael Jordan's record for the most 30-point games in NBA history with 563 games, surpassing Jordan's 562
Key Match Events: LeBron James hit a fadeaway jumper over Onyeka Okongwu to surpass Michael Jordan's record
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers improved to 6-2 in James' returns since December 15, moving six games over.500
